About Dr. Sameera V V

Leading retinal specialist dedicated to compassionate eye care and innovative treatments

Dr. Sameera V V

Retinal Specialist & Founder

Dr. Sameera V V is a highly skilled and experienced retinal specialist with over a decade of expertise in diagnosing and treating complex retinal disorders. As the founder of Sampada VR Specialty Eye Care, she has dedicated her career to providing world-class eye care services with a focus on innovation, compassion, and patient-centered care.

Her commitment to excellence and continuous learning has made her a trusted name in retinal healthcare, serving patients with various conditions including diabetic retinopathy, macular degeneration, retinal detachment, and other complex retinal disorders.

10+
Years Experience
1000+
Successful Surgeries

Qualifications & Expertise

Comprehensive training and specialized skills

Medical Education

MBBS from prestigious medical institution with specialization in Ophthalmology

Specialized Training

Advanced training in retinal surgery and vitreoretinal procedures

Clinical Expertise

Expert in advanced diagnostic techniques and surgical interventions

Pediatric Care

Specialized in pediatric retinal disorders including ROP screening

Laser Procedures

Proficient in various laser treatments for retinal conditions

International Experience

Trained and practiced in leading eye care institutions worldwide

Areas of Specialization

Comprehensive retinal care for all conditions

Retinal Disorders

  • Diabetic Retinopathy
  • Age-related Macular Degeneration
  • Retinal Detachment
  • Retinal Vein Occlusion
  • Macular Holes
  • Epiretinal Membranes

Pediatric Retinal Care

  • Retinopathy of Prematurity (ROP)
  • Pediatric Retinal Disorders
  • Congenital Eye Conditions
  • Vision Development Issues
  • Screening Programs
  • Early Intervention

Surgical Procedures

  • Vitrectomy Surgery
  • Retinal Laser Treatment
  • Intravitreal Injections
  • Scleral Buckling
  • Macular Surgery
  • Complex Retinal Cases

Diagnostic Services

  • OCT Imaging
  • Fluorescein Angiography
  • Visual Field Testing
  • Fundus Photography
  • Electroretinography
  • Genetic Testing

Medical Philosophy

"My approach to patient care is rooted in the belief that every individual deserves personalized, compassionate treatment. I combine cutting-edge medical technology with a human touch, ensuring that each patient feels heard, understood, and cared for throughout their journey to better vision."

"At Sampada VR, we don't just treat eye conditions; we restore hope, confidence, and quality of life. My commitment is to provide the highest standard of retinal care while maintaining the warmth and personal attention that every patient deserves."

- Dr. Sameera V V

Founder & Chief Retinal Specialist
